Alexey Petukhov: Alexey Petukhov by Ivan Isaev from Russian Ski Magazine.JPG | Petukhov in 2009

Olympic Games: Bronze medal - third place | 2010 Vancouver | Team sprint

World Championships: Gold medal - first place | 2013 Val di Flemme | Team sprint
Silver medal - second place | 2015 Falun | Team sprint

Junior World Championships: Gold medal - first place | 2003 Sollefteå | 4 × 10 km relay
Silver medal - second place | 2003 Sollefteå | 30 km freestyle
